params.tag_line: A Blog liked by the coders
params.about-me: Hi, I am Sumit Kumar, I am a full stack web developer and data analyst/scientist, I bring a unique blend of skills to design and develop intuitive, data-driven web applications. I am proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, and SQL, and experienced in popular frameworks like Django. With expertise in data analysis and visualization tools like Tableau and Excel, I can collect, clean, and analyze large data sets to extract meaningful insights for informed decision-making. My passion for technology and problem-solving drives me to stay current, learn new skills, and deliver high-quality solutions.
